questions.prompt: What does the Force mean to you?

options.text: A weapon to command and bend reality.
A current that flows through all living things.
A paradox — both peace and chaos.
A mystery that serves whoever understands it best.
Discipline and control.
Passion and will.
Balance between desire and restraint.
The lessons of failure.

questions.prompt: The Jedi Code teaches serenity. You believe...

options.text: Serenity is weakness disguised as virtue.
It’s the path to clarity and power through peace.
Peace and emotion can coexist.
Codes are cages. Power answers to no creed.
Protect those who cannot defend themselves.
Shape destiny to your own design.
Maintain balance between creation and destruction.
Prove your worth to those who doubt you.
The natural cost of power.
A disease born from fear and pride.
A test — overcome it or embrace it.
An illusion; the Force is beyond morality.

questions.prompt: Your ally lies wounded during battle. You...

options.text: Leave them. The strong survive.
Risk your life to save them.
Finish the battle, then aid them if you can.
Order another to rescue them.

questions.prompt: A traitor in your ranks is revealed. You...

options.text: Strike them down immediately.
Seek to understand why they betrayed you.
Let the Force decide their fate.
Exploit them; betrayal reveals opportunity.

questions.prompt: You find an ancient Sith holocron. What do you do?

options.text: Study it — knowledge is power.
Destroy it — corruption spreads quickly.
Examine it cautiously, learn without yielding.
Hide it where only you can reach it.

questions.prompt: A Jedi Master offers you redemption.

options.text: Strike them down — redemption is a lie.
Accept, even at the cost of your pride.
Refuse without anger. Forge your own path.
Feign acceptance, then strike later.

questions.prompt: A city burns because of your failure. You...

options.text: Feel nothing. The weak perish.
Swear to rebuild it, whatever the cost.
Accept the loss and learn from it.
Use the ashes to build anew, stronger.
Rage — it focuses me.
Compassion — it anchors me.
Curiosity — it fuels me.
Fear — awareness begins there.

questions.prompt: When you look upon your enemies, you feel...

options.text: Pity. They are lost.
Exhilaration. Conflict defines existence.
Understanding. Every enemy is a reflection.
Satisfaction. Their struggle proves your power.
A tool.
A natural transition.
Neither end nor beginning — only a whisper.
The final victory over weakness.
United under an unbreakable will.
Balanced through harmony.
Left to find its own equilibrium.
Ruled by those who dare.

questions.prompt: The Force offers you anything. You ask for...

options.text: Power without limit.
Wisdom beyond death.
Truth — even if it shatters you.
Freedom from destiny.
